resources.string: USSD message must be between %d and %d characters. Please try again.
No voicemail number is stored on the SIM card.
Voicei mail for Call settings can only be changed by the primary user.
Your SIM card has been unblocked. Your phone is unlocking\u2026
Mobile network settings are not available for this user
Select which accounts can make calls
Use default operator settings to display my number in outgoing calls
During a call, notify me of incoming calls
During a call, notify me of incoming calls
Please turn on mobile data and make sure that WLAN is off
Your operator doesn\'t support disabling call forwarding when your phone is busy.
Your operator doesn\'t support disabling call forwarding when your phone doesn\'t answer.
Your carrier doesn\'t support disabling call forwarding when your phone is unreachable.
Call settings can only be changed by the admin user.
SS request modified to DIAL request.
SS request modified to USSD request.
SS request modified to new SS request.
Your Phone app\'s Fixed Dialing Numbers setting is turned on. As a result, some call-related features aren\'t working.
Turn on the radio before viewing these settings.
Couldn\'t change the voicemail number.\nContact your carrier if this problem persists.
Couldn\'t change the forwarding number.\nContact your carrier if this problem persists.
Couldn\'t retrieve and save current forwarding number settings.\nSwitch to the new provider anyway?
The new PIN is too short.
The new PIN is too long.
The new PIN is too weak. A strong password should not have continuous sequence or repeated digits.
The old PIN does not match.
The new PIN contains invalid characters.
Unsupported message type, call %s to listen.
Your SIM card doesn\'t allow a connection to this network.
Can\'t connect to this network right now. Try again later.
Preferred network mode: LTE / GSM / UMTS
Party has barred all Incoming calls.
Use LTE services to improve voice and other communications (recommended)
Connect to data services when roaming
Connect to data services when roaming
You\'ve lost data connectivity because you left your home network with data roaming turned off.
%1$s (%2$d\u066A) of %3$s period maximum\nNext period starts in %4$d days (%5$s)
%1$s maximum exceeded\nData rate reduced to %2$d Kb/s
%1$d\u066A of cycle elapsed\nNext period starts in %2$d days (%3$s)
Data rate reduced to %1$d Kb/s if data use limit is exceeded
More information about your carrier\'s cellular network data use policy
TTY Mode change is not allowed during a video call
FDN wasn\'t updated because you typed an incorrect PIN.
FDN wasn\'t updated because the number is empty or exceeds 20 digits.
FDN wasn\'t updated. The PIN2 was incorrect, or the phone number was rejected.
No contacts on your SIM card.
Turn off airplane mode to import contacts from the SIM card.
The old PIN you typed isn\'t correct. Try again.
The PINs you typed don\'t match. Try again.
Type a PIN that is 4 to 8 numbers.
Password incorrect. PIN now blocked. PUK requested.
Enter a PIN2 that is 4 to 8 numbers.
Enter a PUK2 that is 8 numbers.
Password incorrect. PIN2 now Blocked. To try again, change PIN 2.
Password incorrect. SIM now locked. Enter PUK2.
Turn off airplane mode or battery saver mode to make a call.
Turn off airplane mode to make a call.
Turn off airplane mode or connect to a wireless network to make a call.
Exit emergency callback mode to make a non-emergency call.
Mobile network is not available. Connect to a wireless network to make a call.
To place a call, enter a valid number.
Call cannot be added at this time.
Connect to a wireless network to make a call.
Enable Wi-Fi calling to make a call.
Cannot enter airplane mode during an emergency call.
Can\'t call. %s is not an emergency number.
Can\'t call. Dial an emergency number.
Set the length of DTMF tones
A special call needs to be made to activate your phone service. \n\nAfter pressing \u201CActivate\u201D, listen to the instructions provided to activate your phone.
The phone is activating your mobile data service.\n\nThis can take up to 5 minutes.

If you skip activation, you can\'t place calls or connect to mobile data networks (though you can connect to Wi-Fi networks). Until you activate your phone, you are asked to activate it each time you turn it on.
Follow the spoken instructions until you hear that activation is complete.
Your phone is now activated. It may take up to 15 minutes for service to start.

Your phone didn't activate. 
You may need to find an area with better coverage (near a window, or outside). 

Try again or call customer service for more options.

plurals.name: alert_dialog_exit_ecm
plurals.item: The phone will be in Emergency Callback mode for %s minute. While in this mode no apps using a data connection can be used. Do you want to exit now?
The phone will be in Emergency Callback mode for %s minutes. While in this mode no applications using a data connection can be used. Do you want to exit now?

plurals.name: alert_dialog_not_avaialble_in_ecm
plurals.item: The selected action isn\'t available while in the Emergency Callback mode. The phone will be in this mode for %s minute. Do you want to exit now?
The selected action isn\'t available while in the Emergency Callback mode. The phone will be in this mode for %s minutes. Do you want to exit now?

resources.string: The selected action isn\'t available while in an emergency call.
To turn on video calling, you need to enable Enhanced 4G LTE Mode in network settings.
There was an error while decoding the message.
A SIM card has activated your service and updated your phone\'s roaming capabilities.
There are too many active calls. Please end or merge existing calls before placing a new one.
Enter your voicemail PIN to continue.
UT is not available, please turn off Enhanced 4G LTE Mode in Settings
